headers/MyroSmartPointer.h

00001 #pragma once
00002 
00003 template <class T>
00004 class MyroSmartPointer {
00005   private:
00006     T* ptr;        // pointer to the value
00007     long* count;   // shared number of owners
00008 
00009   public:
00010     // initialize pointer with existing pointer
00011     // - requires that the pointer p is a return value of new
00012     explicit MyroSmartPointer (T* p=0)
00013      : ptr(p), count(new long(1)) {
00014     }
00015 
00016     // copy pointer (one more owner)
00017     MyroSmartPointer (const MyroSmartPointer<T>& p) throw()
00018      : ptr(p.ptr), count(p.count) {
00019         ++*count;
00020     }
00021 
00022     // destructor (delete value if this was the last owner)
00023     ~MyroSmartPointer () throw() {
00024         dispose();
00025     }
00026 
00027     // assignment (unshare old and share new value)
00028     MyroSmartPointer<T>& operator= (const MyroSmartPointer<T>& p) throw() {
00029         if (this != &p) {
00030             dispose();
00031             ptr = p.ptr;
00032             count = p.count;
00033             ++*count;
00034         }
00035         return *this;
00036     }
00037 
00038     // access the value to which the pointer refers
00039     T& operator*() const throw() {
00040         return *ptr;
00041     }
00042     T* operator->() const throw() {
00043         return ptr;
00044     }
00045 
00046     T* get() const{
00047         return ptr;
00048     }
00049 
00050   private:
00051     void dispose() {
00052         if (--*count == 0) {
00053              delete count;
00054              delete ptr;
00055         }
00056     }
00057     
00058 };
